Yeun Tak makes his acting debut in "The Master" as a downtrodden kung fu student who saves the life of a kung fu master, who is being stalked by three killers.
 Yeun Tak makes his acting debut in "The Master" as a downtrodden kung fu student who saves the life of a kung fu master, who is being stalked by three killers.
 A noted kung fu master, Chen Kuan Tai, is ambushed by the three evil masters and badly injured. He is taken care of by a kind-hearted orphan who starts to learn from the master, and eventually realizes he must stamp out the evils. Superb training and action scenes make Three Evil Masters a must-see epic! The action is absolutely superb and the entire movie is fight filled. Not a single scene looks rushed, and I always love it when they save the best for last.
